price: Èṣù ń fi òṣì dẹ́rù bà yín, ó sì ń pa yín ní àṣẹ ìbàjẹ́ ṣíṣe. Allāhu sì ń ṣe àdéhùn àforíjìn àti oore àjùlọ láti ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ fún yín. Allāhu ní Oníbúọlá, Onímọ̀.
arabic: ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱلۡفَقۡرَ وَيَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعِدُكُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَفَضۡلٗاۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
